node.detail_zh: 患者為匡智梨木樹宿舍員工，無外遊紀錄，入住檢疫中心後 8 月 26 日出現症狀。
node.detail_en: The patient is an employee at Hong Chi Lei Muk Shue Dormitory, has no recent travel history and developed symptoms on Aug 26 after being admitted to the quarantine centre.
node.classification_zh: 本地個案的密切接觸者

groups.name_en: Hong Chi Lei Muk Shue Hostel
groups.description_zh: 群組最早朋受感染的是一名社工及兩名工作人員， 8 月 18 日有輕微病徵，3 日後接受社署檢測後確診，其後多名院友及員工確診。
groups.description_en: The earliest cases from this cluster were a social worker and two employees. They had mild symptoms on Aug 18, and 3 days later were diagnosed after receiving testing from the Social Welfare Department. Other employees and residents of the hostel have also since been tested positive.

node.location_en: On Chung House, Shun On Estate
